meaningMnemonic: Until the <kanji>end</kanji> of <kanji>somebody</kanji>, you will be <kanji>punish</kanji>ed. If you are punished to your end, you are being given a <vocabulary>life sentence</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
